title: All Missing Particles in Yasuo Fix pls :C
body:
I did a little investigation of all missing particles in {{champion:157}} 
These particles look beautiful please fix :c

Classic:

The second Q looked prettier
:https://i.imgur.com/VFx4aaK.png
:[2Q: Live](https://imgur.com/cnIVcaL)

Your third Q has Mini Nados
:https://i.imgur.com/fZJ8Kat.png
[3Q: Live](https://imgur.com/klXvmJ3)

Your E+Q looks better:
https://i.imgur.com/0DT5983.png
[E+Q: Live](https://imgur.com/dwuP7Cx)

Your sword has more particles And the textures of Yasuo look better
:https://i.imgur.com/tH6IJNF.png
[R Textures and particles live](https://i.imgur.com/zitVzRj.png)

High Noon:This mask has the some particles but they look blurry and ugly

Your Auto looks better:
https://i.imgur.com/gZoJ8e9.png
[Live :Auto Ugly and fuzzy](https://i.imgur.com/rWRxl65.png)

The second Q looks better:
https://imgur.com/kkZxEv2
[2Q: Live](https://imgur.com/IA5qxkd)

Your third Q has Mini Nados:
https://i.imgur.com/PNgHWvF.png
[3Q: Live](https://imgur.com/wv225rO)

Your E+Q looks better:
https://i.imgur.com/VHn9Dmh.png
[E+Q: Live](https://imgur.com/hodCscX)

When it's in R it looks better:
https://i.imgur.com/m1dFVfm.png
[R Ugly and fuzzy: Live](https://imgur.com/c6Wxksd)

Your sword has more particles And the textures of Yasuo look better:
https://i.imgur.com/ZsQQbsF.png
[R Textures And Particles:Live](https://imgur.com/S1quM4G)

Project Yasuo:The same thing happens to High noon

Your Auto looks better:
https://i.imgur.com/7euhkYz.png
[auto: Live](https://imgur.com/nTDWZ7D)

Your third Q has Mini Nados:
https://i.imgur.com/utSwwed.png

When it's in R it looks better:
https://i.imgur.com/gznZM5s.png
[R:live](https://imgur.com/4Urz5dJ)

Your sword has more particles And the textures of Yasuo look better:
https://i.imgur.com/Dix2cRz.png
[R Texures and Particles: Live](https://imgur.com/iqS2sLX)

Please fix its effects are totally beautiful and soft
Give a little love to the WindBoy :c(I'm sorry for my English,I'm Spanish xd)

replies.body:
Hey, I've now fixed most of these. The only one I couldn't fix was the Q2 looking different, because they all use the same effect. 

These changes should go out next patch.

Thanks for your investigation.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Beardilocks,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=esoyIfUX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-11T00:25:56.174+0000)
>
> Hey, I've now fixed most of these. The only one I couldn't fix was the Q2 looking different, because they all use the same effect. 
> 
> These changes should go out next patch.
> 
> Thanks for your investigation.

look here is the deferenece, we need old vfx, all yasuo's are pissed off

[Video Q2 YasNB 1:45](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ibWAzx3TZs&t=108s)
